dict.string: Connect the Gateway to your home WiFi router via an Ethernet cable, and plug in the power cord./n Scan QR code on gateway back side to download the "iHomeware" APP./n Run the APP and follow the instructions to press "connect" button on the middle of the gateway, then input the email address to log in.
Remove the battery isolation tape on devices and press "connect" button on the middle of the gateway. When the device is connected to the gateway, the gateway sends out a beep sound.

For beacons and vibration sensors: quick press for over 10 times within 5 seconds./n For contact, PIR and SOS sensors: take off the backside cover and long press black buttom for 5 seconds or more./n For smoke detectors: Long press side key for 5 seconds or more./n For smart LED strips: long press the black buttom on controller for 5 seconds or more./n For smart outlet: long press On/Off button for 5 seconds or more.For smart bulbs: keep turning on and off for 7 times, and each time the light must be turned on for 3 to 5 seconds.
4.Why there is beep sound notification from gateway?

When new devices connected into system, there will be beep sound./n When gateway reboot, all devices will be reconnected into system with beep sound./n When connected devices rejoin the network after off line event, there will be beep soud.
5.What's the difference between Home/Arm and Away/Arm?

Home/Arm: by default, only contact sensors will be enabled.User can change setting manually to customize./n Away/Arm: by default,All devices will be enabled. User can change setting manually to customize.
6.What to do when mobile phone can not receive push message.
Check if 3G/4G or WiFi has data service, and also check if iHomeware App is protected at the background and its push message function is allowed.
7.In what cases the system will arm and disarm automatically?

Automatic arm and disarm function requires both beacon and contact sensor./n When door is closed with no beacon in presence, system will determine no family member is at home and arm automatically in 10 minutes./n When door is open with beacon in presence, system will determine at least one family member is back and disarm automatically.
8.What to do when the device is placed too far from the gateway to communicate?
User can add a smart outlet from iHomeware as a router between gateway and devices to extend distance.
9.What to do when gateway upgrade fails?

During upgrade process, only power light is on, and the gateway will be send out "Arm at home"/n sound when upgrade completes.Please wait up to 3 minutes if there is any wrong during upgrade. If the gateway doesnâ€™t restart in 3 minutes, please turn off the gateway and and turn back on.The gateway will start upgrade process again automatically in 2 minutes.
